text:
Hello, I am working on one module in local development. I would like to use information from fields.json file in JS. How can I import/fetch it?

_Nothing seem to work for me…_
Just tried. Did not work for me unfortunately :disappointed:

Hi!

Any help with this will be greatly appreciated.

I’m trying to replace the innerHTML of a div.
I, first, tried to select the `data attribute (data-featuredtext)` within each of my `<a>` tags that have the class name `link-text`.

But I’m trying to work out what the syntax is in an `.each` like so:

`$("a.link-text").each(function(i) {`
`var text = $(this).data(featuredtext);`
 `$(".og-featured__links").append( '' + text + '').html();`
`});`

Here is the <div> I’ll love replaced with the data attributes from below:
`<div class="og-featured__links"></div>`

Here’s my HTML snippet for further clarification:

```<a class="link-text" data-featuredtext="<h6>Case Study</h6>" href="<https://digication.com/case-study>"></a>
<a class="link-text" data-featuredtext="<h6>Examples</h6>" href="<https://digication.com/case-study>"></a>
<a class="link-text" data-featuredtext="<h6>Resources</h6>" href="<https://digication.com/case-study>"></a>```
